Some say straying more than a few blocks from the main plaza at night is dangerous.
Moto taxis (motorcycles) or the occasional real taxi

value: - on the main plaza. Rooms about 25b a night with shared bathroom. Kind of dirty, owners are kind of Slum-lordish. Loud when the ubiquitious celebrations in the Plaza occur at all times of day or night. The bathrooms upstairs don't work and you must go downstairs to use an ugly one. DO NOT give them laundry to do; they lose things.
- about 8 blocks from the main plaza heading towards the airport. About 20 beds a night with shared bathroom. Tranquile.

Internet is generally slow and on slow machines that cost 10 B an hour. Telephone calls to the U.S. are a bit steep.
